snippet.title: 'The Sacred Hero' for Nintendo Switch - Early Development Teaser
snippet.description:
Enter the world of The Sacred Hero (title not final) in 2018, a unique adventure game that twists the conventions of the RPG genre.

Arriving 2018 on PC and the Nintendo Switch.

'Sword' asset courtesy of Nintendo & The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess. Used as a placeholder, will be replaced in final game and later trailers.

SiMPLiSTiC 2016 © All Rights Reserved
